text: Pharaoh () is a 1966 Polish drama movie directed by Jerzy Kawalerowicz and was adapted by the novel of the same name by Bolesław Prus. It stars Jerzy Zelnik, Piotr Pawłowski, Leszek Herdegen, Emir Buczacki, Ryszard Ronczewski, Wiesława Mazurkiewicz and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1967. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jerzy Kawalerowicz
title: Pharaoh (movie)
